content: The US Justice Department and the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) have targeted American Muslims in abusive counterterrorism “sting operations” based on religious and ethnic identity, Human Rights Watch and Human Rights Institute said.
translations: ita:Il ministero della Giustizia degli Stati Uniti e il Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) hanno preso di mira i musulman
